mapper.update: update HRM_USER_BASIC_INFO set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ACCNT = #{userAccnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_ACCNT, PASSWORD, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE from HRM_USER_BASIC_INFO
